title: Groovy script failure in OBM integration after upgrade to v25.4
content:
After upgrading Operations Bridge Manager (OBM) to v25.4, the Run Test operation fails during the creation of an External Event Process request, with the following error:

Ping failed due to the following error: Ping request to Connected Server 'OMi_Endpoint' on node '<OBM server host name>' failed with exception: org.springframework.remoting.RemoteAccessException: Could not access remote service [rmi://localhost:21303/ExternalProcessAccessService]; nested exception is java.rmi.UnmarshalException: Error unmarshaling return; nested exception is: java.io.WriteAbortedException: writing aborted; java.io.NotSerializableException: org.codehaus.groovy.control.CompilerConfiguration$1.

Cause

This issue occurs due to recent standardization updates to the Groovy script, which enforce stricter validation and security rules to ensure safer and more consistent execution.

Solution

To fix the issue, use the SMAGroovyAdapter script from the OMi Integration with Service Management Automation package v3.3 or later. Download the package from Marketplace.
